name: NBCNews
text:
Over 12,000 people have been arrested in child porn cases flagged by the Child Protection System software over the past 10 years, Child Rescue Coalition says.

But the problem has intensified since the coronavirus lockdown, law enforcement officials say. https://t.co/ADpUDMR8rP

name: NBCNews
text: “That’s why we may end up with herd immunity,” a Mississippi doctor says. “Only the strong — or the people who take it seriously — will survive and many, many others will perish. I hate to say it, but we’re almost at natural selection at this point.” https://t.co/T5I2UyOfTT
